snippet: The product designer may be unable to escape his father’s reputation as a high-profile inventor, but he’s made a name for himself reinventing light fixtures.
abstract: Interview with Jake Dyson, lamp designer whose newest lamp, $900 CSYS LED task lamp, has built-in cooling mechanism intended to give its LEDs an extraordinarily long life.
lead_paragraph: The product designer may be unable to escape his father’s reputation as a high-profile inventor, but he’s made a name for himself reinventing light fixtures.

headline.seo: Jake Dyson on Designing Lamps - Q&A
headline.main: Jake Dyson, Lamp Designer, on Form Versus Function
headline.print_headline: Jake Dyson, Lamp Designer, on Form Versus Function
